nodes.text: Star Wars: A New Hope - The Official Celebration Special

Star Wars: A New Hope - The Official Celebration Special, colloquially known as A New Hope Celebration Special, is a canon magazine that reviews the inspiration and creation of the 1977 film Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, celebrating the film's fortieth anniversary. The issue was published on September 19, 2017 by Titan Magazines.
Star Wars: A New Hope: The Official Celebration Special pays tribute to the 1977 movie that started the Star Wars franchise.

Discover how George Lucas created an epic story that has enthralled generation after generation for 40 years, and learn how the worlds, aliens and droids made the journey from the mind of a very independent filmmaker to become icons of popular culture.
